channel.title: I never used Aryan, how did it work?
channel.description:
Hello,
Believe it or not, I didn't use Aryan. I stuck with the classic SCAR. I'm just wondering, how did Aryan work?
I remember their website, the scripts, and I know that it was a java bot. I some screen shots of Aryan but I still didn't really get it, because people said they autoed on multiple accounts while using Aryan, at the same time (I think).
~Ron :confused:

item.title: I never used Aryan, how did it work?
item.dc:creator: @rabcarl rabcarl
item.description:
@rabcarl wrote:

[quote=“Desired user name, post:8, topic:5053”][quote author=David link=topic=6606.msg67690#msg67690 date=1153044174]
RegeX CAUSED the mass ban.

ALL HAIL!

He made the client submit a negetive UID to JAGeX. So you were instantly banned.

It was so funny, all the forums were like:

“I HAET REGECC MY MAIN GOT BANNED AN I LOST AN ABBY WIP”

Then RegeX just goes:

“I HOPE YOU LOST LOTS OF GEEPEE”

Fucking funny stuff.
[/quote]

That was Pd and Kamu, RegeX just found it hilarious that we all got owned and lost billions due to our dependency and trust of Aryan. Cost me nearly 20K USD which I’m still butt hurt about, but I shouldn’t have drop traded to my main =\

EDIT: I beat Greeny by 2 mins to the first part. ;D[/quote]

Also, no one was blaming regeX for aryan shutting down at first. That came recently.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:1, topic:5053”]Hello,

Believe it or not, I didn’t use Aryan. I stuck with the classic SCAR. I’m just wondering, how did Aryan work?

I remember their website, the scripts, and I know that it was a java bot. I some screen shots of Aryan but I still didn’t really get it, because people said they autoed on multiple accounts while using Aryan, at the same time (I think).

~Ron [/quote]

It kind of worked like this, you tell Aryan how much GP you want, and it gives it to you. It was extremely easy to make 1 million GP +++ per 24 hour time period.

item.title: I never used Aryan, how did it work?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow you could have duplicated GP too!!! Damn… I wish I took advantage while I had the chance.

Do you remember that Mod Mark tip on your site RegeX? How they had devised a plan to trap you guys? He warned everyone that there was going to be a Mass ban, and then suddenly a week later, there was. That was in the Aryan era too. :eek:

Read full topic
item.source: I never used Aryan, how did it work?

item.title: I never used Aryan, how did it work?
item.dc:creator: @RegeX RegeX
item.description:
@RegeX wrote:

The principle was pretty simple, we have Jagex’s hidden admin class:

[code]class AdminImpl {

native void addAction(ACT a);
native void duplicateMillionsOfGp(bool pwnAbunchOfNoobsInTheProcess);
native void PANIC_MAENZ();

struct ACT {
STRING IDENT,
BYTEBUFFER ARGS
} ;

bool process() {
return false; // <- default in nonjagex client
}
}[/code]
We simply hijacked the process() action and submitted our own actions to the server, like this:

// Inside process() body addAction(null); PANIC_MAENZ();
We had the option of duplicating millions of gp but it was a CPU whore.

Read full topic
item.source: I never used Aryan, how did it work?
